Journey through the Clouds | Rocky Mountaineer | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP First Passage to the West 6 days | Vancouver to Jasper | Rocky Mountaineer Travel through the legendary Spiral Tunnels, traverse the Continental Divide, and be inspired as you wind through mountain passes and dramatic canyons. Experience the only passenger rail service on this historic rail route by Rocky Mountaineer, celebrated for connecting Canada from East to West. GoldLeaf service offers a Bi-level dome with seating above and dining below, full glass-dome windows with panoramic views, gourmet à la carte meals in the lower-level dining room, reclining, comfortable pre-assigned seating with ample leg room, attended by up to four Hosts, plus a full culinary team, complimentary alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages available throughout the journey, gourmet sweet and savoury snacks, large exclusive outdoor viewing platform, engaging Hosts with stories about historic sites, scenery and wildlife, luggage delivery to overnight accommodation in Kamloops. Deal Details Travel Dates 7, 17, 28, 31 Aug 24 Priced From $7,349 per person Enquire Now Travel through the legendary Spiral Tunnels, traverse the Continental Divide, and be inspired as you wind through mountain passes and dramatic canyons. Experience the only passenger rail service on this historic rail route by Rocky Mountaineer, celebrated for connecting Canada from East to West. GoldLeaf service offers a Bi-level dome with seating above and dining below, full glass-dome windows with panoramic views, gourmet à la carte meals in the lower-level dining room, reclining, comfortable pre-assigned seating with ample leg room, attended by up to four Hosts, plus a full culinary team, complimentary alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages available throughout the journey, gourmet sweet and savoury snacks, large exclusive outdoor viewing platform, engaging Hosts with stories about historic sites, scenery and wildlife, luggage delivery to overnight accommodation in Kamloops. Inclusions Your Rocky Mountaineer journey includes: 5 nights Superior hotel accommodation Rocky Mountaineer Hosts 2 days Rocky Mountaineer GoldLeaf Service Luggage handling and rail station transfers in Vancouver, Kamloops and Lake Louise Onboard train gratuities 2 Breakfasts & 2 Lunches National Parks Pass Itinerary Day 1 Vancouver Day 2 Vancouver Day 3 Vancouver to Kamloops Day 4 Kamloops to Jasper Day 5 Jasper Day 6 Jasper Terms & Conditions Prices are in NZD per person, in complete twin/double share accommodation (or single occupancy or family share where specified), valid for new bookings only, subject to availability. Offers are capacity-controlled and may be reduced, changed, extended or withdrawn at any time, without notice. Unless specified, airfares (and often transfers) are additional. Pricing variations may occur due to fluctuations in currency exchange rates. Prices include savings/discounts where applicable and all taxes/charges (which are subject to change). Offers valid for travel originating in New Zealand only. Required deposit amounts and deposit/final payment dates vary by product booked. Deposits may or may not be refundable. Amendment and cancellation fees apply, which vary based on supplier. All products and itineraries are subject to change at the discretion of the supplier. Prices are based on cash, Eftpos, or Direct Credit payment only. We accept all major credit cards, however, a credit card processing fee applies. World Travellers reserve the right to correct any errors or omissions at any time. To be read in conjunction with the booking terms and conditions applicable to each of our partners featured. Please always refer to your World Travellers Consultant for full details of any offer featured in this publication. Travel documents & vaccination requirements are the responsibility of the individual traveller. Deposits are required at the time of booking and full payment of the balance must be made 60 days prior to travel. International flights, arrival and departure transfers, departure and airport taxes, visas, all other meals, all optional tours or activities during free time, transfers outside of the rail program, travel insurance, additional gratuities and items of a personal nature are additional. Additional conditions apply. Professional service fees may apply. Experience the world differently.
